text:
UNIVERSITY OF SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA
UNIVERSITY PARK
LOS ANGELES 7
November 26, 19^7
Professor Raymond Cheydlenr, Chairman
NASB Research Committee
Florida State University
Tallahassee, Florida
Dear Ray,
It would be very helpful if meetings of the Research
Committee could be scheduled for Wednesday evening or
Thursday evening (or both) of the week of the seminar. This
would permit some of us to be home on Friday evening.
You may recall that at our meetings in Chicago we discussed
the possibility of having a meeting of the committee on
Saturday. I believe that the question of the time of the
meeting was left open. You may have noticed in a recent
coramiinication from Harry Skornia that he plans to join the
seminar on Thursday evening. Any consideration that you are
able to give to holding meetings on Wednesday and Thursday will
be much appreciated.
I look forward with great pleasure to seeing you again
in Columbus.
Cordially,
Kenneth Harwood, Chairman
Department of Telecommunications
